id.description: The numerical ID of the desired status.

count.description: Specifies the number of records to retrieve. Must be less than or equal to 100.

cursor.description: Causes the list of IDs to be broken into pages of no more than 100 IDs at a time. The number of IDs returned is not guaranteed to be 100 as suspended users are filtered out after connections are queried.

stringify_ids.description: Many programming environments will not consume Tweet ids due to their size. Provide this option to have ids returned as strings instead.
